title: *NO FEE* Central A/C, garage parking, granite/stainless kitchen*SEPT 1
posting_body: *NO FEE* Central A/C, garage parking, granite/stainless kitchen, SEPT 1*
Check out this amazing 2 bed 2 bath apartment.
The unit was gut renovated in 2021.
Finishes include high end luxury plank flooring throughout.
New kitchen with white cabinets, granite c-tops and stainless steel appliances.
Both bathrooms gut renovated with modern tiling.
Huge open layout for dining and living room.
Rent directly through management and pay NO BROKER FEES!!
Please call, text or email to schedule a showing.
IF YOU ARE REPLYING THROUGH CL, PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS IN REPLY
Micozzi Management 159 Cambridge St Allston MA 02134
Micozzi Management owns and professionally manages all of our buildings.
If this isnt exactly what you are looking for, follow the link below to check out our other apartment options.

As an equal opportunity housing provider, Micozzi Management provides housing opportunities regardless of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, physical or mental disability, familial status or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state or local law.
404 Langley Rd is a professionally owned and managed building.
Renters here enjoy garage parking and central air conditioning!
Rt 9 is a stone's throw away.
Easy access to Rt 95 and Mass Pike.
The Chestnut Hill Mall, Wegmans and several other retail shops and restaurants within a couple minute drive.
Walk to the T at Newton Centre in less than 15 minutes.
